mapper.select: select * from v_pvpart t1 where pvpartid=#{id}
select * from v_pvpart t1 where pvpartid=#{id}
select * from v_pvpart t1 where pvpartid=#{id}
select * from v_pvpart t1 where pvpartid=#{id}
select * from v_pvpart t1 where pvpartid=#{id}
select * from v_pvpart t1 where pvpartid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CTRLID, t1.MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID, t11.PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PVPARTID, t1.PVPARTNAME, t1.PVPARTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPVPART t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID WHERE ( t1.PORTALPAGEID = #{srf.datacontext.portalpageid} )

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CTRLID`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`PORTALPAGEID`, t11.`PORTALPAGENAME`, t1.`PVPARTID`, t1.`PVPARTNAME`, t1.`PVPARTTYPE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SRFPVPART` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID WHERE ( t1.`PORTALPAGEID` = #{srf.datacontext.portalpageid} )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CTRLID, t1.MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID, t11.PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PVPARTID, t1.PVPARTNAME, t1.PVPARTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPVPART t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID WHERE ( t1.PORTALPAGEID = #{srf.datacontext.portalpageid} )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.CTRLID AS CTRLID, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID AS PORTALPAGEID, t11.PORTALPAGENAME AS PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PVPARTID AS PVPARTID, t1.PVPARTNAME AS PVPARTNAME, t1.PVPARTTYPE AS PVPARTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPVPART t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID WHERE ( t1.PORTALPAGEID = #{srf.datacontext.portalpageid} )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.CTRLID AS CTRLID, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID AS PORTALPAGEID, t11.PORTALPAGENAME AS PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PVPARTID AS PVPARTID, t1.PVPARTNAME AS PVPARTNAME, t1.PVPARTTYPE AS PVPARTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPVPART t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID WHERE ( t1.PORTALPAGEID = #{srf.datacontext.portalpageid} )

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[CTRLID], t1.[MEMO], t1.[PORTALPAGEID], t11.[PORTALPAGENAME], t1.[PVPARTID], t1.[PVPARTNAME], t1.[PVPARTTYPE], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFPVPART] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID WHERE ( t1.[PORTALPAGEID] = #{srf.datacontext.portalpageid} )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CTRLID, t1.MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID, t11.PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PVPARTID, t1.PVPARTNAME, t1.PVPARTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPVPART t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CTRLID`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`PORTALPAGEID`, t11.`PORTALPAGENAME`, t1.`PVPARTID`, t1.`PVPARTNAME`, t1.`PVPARTTYPE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SRFPVPART` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CTRLID, t1.MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID, t11.PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PVPARTID, t1.PVPARTNAME, t1.PVPARTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPVPART t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.CTRLID AS CTRLID, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID AS PORTALPAGEID, t11.PORTALPAGENAME AS PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PVPARTID AS PVPARTID, t1.PVPARTNAME AS PVPARTNAME, t1.PVPARTTYPE AS PVPARTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPVPART t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.CTRLID AS CTRLID, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID AS PORTALPAGEID, t11.PORTALPAGENAME AS PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PVPARTID AS PVPARTID, t1.PVPARTNAME AS PVPARTNAME, t1.PVPARTTYPE AS PVPARTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPVPART t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[CTRLID], t1.[MEMO], t1.[PORTALPAGEID], t11.[PORTALPAGENAME], t1.[PVPARTID], t1.[PVPARTNAME], t1.[PVPARTTYPE], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFPVPART] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFPORTALPAGE t11 ON t1.PORTALPAGEID = t11.PORTALPAGEID
